Title: NetOpenFwk
Description:
A nice & simple Framework to develop SOA .NET apps
Includes MBI like dispatcher, CRUD engine, UI controls, DBHelper, XL and PDF generation, aspects (security, log, exception handling)
HomeWiki:
More info at: http://www.pampasystems.com.ar

An EASY SOA-Net Framework
  • Best practices over .NET C# ASPNet+Ajax
  • SOA Dispatcher: inProc+WS
  • CRUD Engine
  • DBHelper: multi DB, XML ready
  • Membership
  • UI Controls (Combo, DatePicker, AmountPicker)
  • Reports: generates XL, PDF
  • Aspects: Exception handling, Log, Security
  • ESB: enterprise service bus
  • SMSEngine: process any SMS message! We developed a mobile parking system on top of it, for La Plata, Argentina
  • New! Now UI in jQuery,Html5, and services API in Rest/Json !!!

Dev.guide (spanish): NetOpenFwk_Guia.rar
